info.name: Declutter Series - DeviantArt
info.description: Removes adverts and useless buttons. Sticks the top bar to the top of the page. Faithful in style to unmodified DeviantArt, compatible with most other themes. Part of the Declutter Series.
info.additionalInfo:
18/01/15
  • Removed adverts from Badges page.
  • Removed "Get Premium" buttons from profile editing.
09/04/15
  • Removed advert from messages page.
